pageContext.claim: “‘The President has received glowing reviews from the British Media. Here at home, not so much. MSNBC Ramps up hateful coverage and promotes conspiracy theories during Trump’s trip to Europe.’  @seanhannity  The good news is that @maddow is dying in the ratings, along with @CNN!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump did not receive glowing reviews from the British press, which noted mass protests directed at him in London, his poorly fitting white-tie attire during a banquet at Buckingham Palace, and his insulting remarks toward London Mayor Sadiq Khan and Meghan Markle, the Duchess of Sussex.
